name: Sudoku Web Dev Container
postCreateCommand: sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /workspace/app && cd /workspace/app && npm install && sudo npx playwright install-deps chromium && npx playwright install chromium && git config --global user.name "${localEnv:GIT_USER_NAME:-Dev User}" && git config --global user.email "${localEnv:GIT_USER_EMAIL:-dev@example.com}"
